| An eye of doom:* can [fly](/wiki/Fly "Fly").
* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* cannot pick up items.
* has no hands.
* has no limbs.
* has no head.
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is neither male nor female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* appears only in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").
* cannot be [tamed](/wiki/Scroll_of_taming "Scroll of taming"). |                                                                                                                                                           |
html:
Eye of doom

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
e eye of doom (No tile)
Difficulty 19
Attacks Gaze attack 1d20 study, Passive 1d7 paralysis, Cast 0d0 mage spell
e eye of doom (No tile)
Difficulty 19
Attacks

Gaze attack 1d20 study, Passive 1d7 paralysis, Cast 0d0 mage spell

Base level 15
Base experience 411
Speed 12
Base AC -9
Base MR 100
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 10
Nutritional value 10
Size small
Resistances fire, sleep, poison
Resistances conveyed sleep

An eye of doom:

  • can fly.
  • can survive underwater.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no hands.
  • has no limbs.
  • has no head.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is neither male nor female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • cannot be tamed.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Eye_of_doom&oldid=102202"
